entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Temperature steady near minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 18 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 20.
